passage_text: Dustin Johnson began his 2013 season with a win at the season opening Hyundai Tournament of Champions, an event reserved for winners from the past season. Johnson won by four strokes over defending champion Steve Stricker. The event was Johnson’s seventh PGA Tour win and his third in a 54-hole event. As an amateur, Dustin won the Monroe Invitational and the Northeast Amateur in 2007 and played on the winning 2007 Walker Cup and Palmer Cup teams. Dustin Johnson is the first player since Tiger Woods to win at least once in each of his first seven seasons coming out of college.

Dustin Johnson is a professional golfer. Dustin played collegiate golf at Coastal Carolina University. As an amateur, Dustin won the Monroe Invitational and the Northeast Amateur in 2007 and played on the winning 2007 Walker Cup and Palmer Cup teams. Dustin Johnson is the first player since Tiger Woods to win at least once in each of his first seven seasons coming out of college. He turned professional in 2007, and qualified for the PGA Tour in 2008. He won his first two PGA Tour events that same year, and has gone on to win five more PGA Tour events since then. To date, he has tied for fifth place at the PGA Championship, and tied for eighth place at the U.S. Open. He has also tied for second place at The Open Championship. He tied for thirteenth at the Masters Tournament in April of 2013. In August 2013, Dustin Johnson announced his engagement to model Paulina Gretzky (Wayne Gretzky's super hot daughter).
